settings.text: Marvel Power Group is a boutique, climate-focused transaction broker and commercial advisor. We provide expert services to clients in transportation, power and gas operations, waste management, industrial processing, trading and logistics.

Energy Transition is our core and only focus. We structure complex, meaningfully large renewable natural gas (RNG) and renewable thermal credit (RTC) transactions for companies committed to environmentally-sound, real world solutions. Our principals are experienced practitioners who have run companies, originated and closed complex deals, advocated and negotiated favorable policy and advanced technological innovation. With over three decades of combined experience in renewables specifically, our customers chose us, every time, for our unparalleled industry knowledge, market acumen, professionalism, and commitment to their prosperity.

settings.title: $6B
settings.text: in cumulative Renewable Energy and RNG closings

settings.name: Katherine
settings.title: Katherine Ryzhaya
settings.description: A serial entrepreneur and industry expert, Katherine has nearly 20 years of experience in running infrastructure businesses and closing complex energy transactions. As the sole founder of Marvel, in 2019, Katherine saw an opportunity to run a business her way — leading with high integrity, unmatched focus on service quality and utmost commitment to driving customers’ yields.
settings.career:
• CEO, Renovar, Shell Digital Ventures
  • CCO, Lightsource bp
  • Co-Founder and CCO, AMS (acquired by Fluence, NASDAQ: FLNC)
  • VP and Director, Evolution Markets
  • Principal, Pacific Gas and Electric Company
settings.education:
• BS, Finance, University of San Francisco
  • MBA, Finance, Duke University

settings.name: Sam
settings.title: Sam Peelle
settings.description: Sam has over 10 years of experience in renewable power and gas markets, with expertise in renewable fuels, demand side management, energy procurement, energy storage and analytics. Throughout his career, Sam has worked on all sides of the transaction, in each case leading with integrity, customer service and a keen focus on delivering results that positively impact the client’s bottom line and environmental impact.
settings.career:
• Director, AMS (acquired by Fluence, NASDAQ: FLNC)
  • Manager, EnerNOC (acquired by Enel, BIT: ENEL)
  • Regional Manager, United Technologies Corporation
settings.education:
• BA, Political Science, University of Pennsylvania
  • MBA, Finance, Babson College

settings.text: Cast a wide net and access the broadest set of market participants
Drive healthy competitive tension to secure best-in-market deals
Leverage deep experience accumulated through repeat transactions
Know, in real time, who is looking to sell, invest, divest or procure
Leverage our market-maker position to disseminate actionable knowledge
Be available and immediately responsive to our clients

settings.title: Why Work With Us
settings.description: Marvel is a premier broker of term offtake transactions in the biofuels space.
settings.description2:
We additionally support the full breadth of our clients’ commercial agendas related to buying and selling renewable fuels and transacting physical and financial environmental products.

Working with Marvel gives our clients a distinct financial and reputational advantage. Through the years, Marvel has proven it can achieve a better combination of economics and terms (ex: contained performance and regulatory risk) than clients can attain themselves.
settings.description3: Whether we run a structured, CFO-approved tender process or connect well-fitting counterparties bilaterally, our clients can be assured they locked in the best available in-market deal each and every time.
